citation.article-title: Phylogenetic characterization of the bacterium-like organism associated with marginal chlorosis of strawberry and proposition of a Candidatus taxon for the organism, 'Candidatus phlomobacter fragariae'.

p.s: Description of Phlomobacter fragariae sp. nov.
Phlomobacter fragariae (Phlomobacter from the Greek phloos (bark) and bacter (bacterium))

The marginal chlorosis bacterium is thus described as follows: 'Candidatus Phlomobacter fragariae' [(γ-3 Proteobacteria) NC; G-F; NAS (GenBank no. U91515), oligonucleotide sequence complementary to unique region of 16s rDNA 5'-ACCAATTGACATTAGCGA-3', S (Fragaria x ananassa, phloem); M;].
